Pattern Library

reviews component

< back to style guide

PROPS:
  • gets quote, name (optional), reviewDate (optional) and byline (optional) from reviews.json file
  • alignment: can be left or center (optional, center is the default)

"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Accusantium aliquam!"
